header.title: We actively collaborate with integration partners that can empower our Kumuluz Digital Platform to help their customers accelerate the digital transformation and develop new digital products.
header.subtitle: Become our partner

our-partners.title: Who are our integration partners?
our-partners.description: Our partners are most often regional system integrators and software development companies with a substantial track record, serving big enterprises, companies, the government and other institutions in the region.

what-we-offer.title: What do we offer to our integration partners?
what-we-offer.description: We offer substantial benefits to our integration partners

items.item-1: Introduction of Kumuluz Digital Platform components
items.item-2: Use and reuse of Kumuluz Business APIs
items.item-3: Use of our components for the partnersâ€™ own portfolio of products
items.item-4: Knowledge of how our products work and training for their implementation
items.item-5: Possibility of cooperation in the development
items.item-6: Full training to get familiar with the Kumuluz products

integration-partners.title: Are you interested in becoming our integration partner?
integration-partners.summary: Contact us using the form below.
